News

JE Bennett Law at “Wings for Life”.

12th May 2016 by Jane Bennett

JE Bennett Law recently took part in the World Run in Cambridge in aid of spinal cord medical research charity “Wings for Life”. Here's a couple of photos:   

JE Bennett at the wings for life run in Cambridge

20th April 2016 by Jane Bennett

The team are heading to Cambridge on May 8th to take part in the Wings for Life World Run
wings for life
For most of us, training has been brief, so wish us luck, we'll need it! Obviously, it's all in a good cause, raising money to help those with spinal cord injuries. Here is a link to our just giving page:

just giving
